about_the_game:
Live The Ultimate Bowling Experience for Both PC & PCVR Lovers!



By playing bowling, listening to music and competing with your friends in 36 stunning venues!



With 36 stunning bowling venues to choose from, you'll never get bored of the same old lanes again.

But CLASHBOWL isn't just about bowling - it's about creating the ultimate immersive experience for players.

That's why we've included a built-in YouTube player, so you can listen to your favorite music or podcasts while you play.

Compete against players from all over the world and climb the ranks to become the best bowler in CLASHBOWL.

With our top ranking system, you can see how you stack up against the competition and improve your skills over time.

But why CLASHBOWL?

Listen...

You get the chance to play bowling just like in real life on 36 unique places!

It's about the experience!

So what are you waiting for?

Start playing the ultimate online multiplayer bowling game today!

Oh, just to tease you up...

Here are the 36 venues:

1. Las Vegas

2. Space Station

3. Winterberg

4. Alberta

5. Balaceanca

6. Jukju Castle

7. Rome

8. London

9. Rio de Janeiro

10. Oymyakon

11. Luxor

12. Tabuk

13. Ankara

14. Athens

15. Persepolis

16. New York

17. Chernobyl

18. Bahamas

19. Beverly Hills

20. Zermatt

21. Vemdalen

22. Moscow

23. Transfagarasan

24. Al Kufrah

25. Zijincheng

26. Chicago

27. Seychelles

28. Alaska

29. Berlin

30. Luton

31. Los Angeles

32. Venice

33. Amsterdam

34. Baghdad

35. Costa del Sol

36. Avshalom Cave
detailed_description:
RAY TRACING SUPPORTED

You can now play CLASHBOWL while enjoying the beauty of Ray Tracing technology!

Amazing graphics are awaiting for you!

All you have to do is go to settings and enable Ray Tracing on!cl


NO MORE HOT VIDEO CARD!

You can now select from 3 quality levels that fits your device needs (Low Medium and High)

In addition to that, you can enable Ray Tracing and DLSS for better quality

All dynamically to avoid putting pressure on your PC/laptop resources.


CONTROL & AIM YOUR THROWS FIXED!

You can now throw comfortably the ball without issues.


TRY IT FOR FREE!

Yeah, no risks.

Download the free version and give it a try.

If you like it, grab it and see you later online.

If not, you'll not hurt our feelings

And you can always let us know what you expected better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ventura 13.6.4
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ventura 13.6.4
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

name: CLASHBOWL

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $19.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $0.99 USD.
subs.option_text: $19.99 USD for a month, then $0.99 USD / month

package_groups.title: Buy CLASHBOWL Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RT 2070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: Live The Ultimate Bowling Experience for Both PC & PCVR Lovers by playing bowling, listening to music and competing with your friends in 36 stunning venues!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Hebrew
*languages with full audio support
